text.div:
BC VerificationStatus Logical Model

Whether an assessment has been confirmed by testing or observation. CIMI Alignment: This attribute corresponds to FindingContext.status, but has been defined to align with FHIR. In AllergyIntolerance, the type is code.

name: VerificationStatusModel
title: BC VerificationStatus Logical Model
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC)
description:
Whether an assessment has been confirmed by testing or observation.
CIMI Alignment: This attribute corresponds to FindingContext.status, but has been defined to align with FHIR. In AllergyIntolerance, the type is code.
